question: What does the Q-Composite scheme add on top of the classic Random Key Pre-distribution one?
answers: It requires that any set of Q nodes is fully connected.
It requires that two nodes share at least Q keys in orded to communicate.
It does not build on the classic scheme.
correct: It requires that two nodes share at least Q keys in orded to communicate.

answers: It requires that any set of Q nodes is fully connected.
It requires that two nodes share at least Q keys in orded to communicate.
